text: Hi, just wondered if anyone could help me identify the correct role name for a front-end developer who also can put together websites using HubSpot if such a thing exists? I didnt know if HubSpot developer was too specific?

there are a lot of Agencies and Companies looking for "HubSpot Developer" on Linkedin Jobs so i dobut that it is too specific. This could also be a good resource to see what others are looking for, writing in their jobs postings

If it's HubSpot only then HubSpot Developer should be sufficient.
If it's part HubSpot cms work then I'd stick with Web Developer / Front end Developer and put that you use the HubSpot CMS in the description as a requirement
